name: Big Ron
text: Raising the bar on mobiles nightlife...Great food...Awesome staff..all set in a comfortable atmosphere that will definitely impress you..mid evening or late into the night the vibe here makes the Boulevard one of Mobile's top spots hands down....

name: Nikki Munson
text: Friendly staff and great atmosphere! Definitely plan to visit again when I get the chance!

name: Jeffrey Baltodano
text: We went about 10:30 and there were maybe 5 people there.  The dance floor was empty.  We turned and went to downtown Mobile

resp.text: Ouch...1 star...we open at 7 ...if you had stayed for little longer you would have had to stand in line...but sorry your visit was not up to par but if you and your guest deside to try the Boulevard again..ask for the manager and ill cover ya and let your party skip the line..

name: Trena Jones
text: The new make over is awesome... The staff is amazing and it's my favorite place to unwind.

name: Taylor Trout
text: Amazing staff and atmosphere. Definitely a place to check out.

name: Lynn Lang
text: Had a blast didn't leave til the sun came up!!!

name: Carolyn Butler
text: This place was great.The service was great.Good music you can dance play pool eat

resp.text: glad you had a great time...thanks for the stars...

name: Faisal Alzurifi
text: It used to be good but they charge you five dollars to get in which is not worth it.

resp.text: The cover charge starts at 3am...not to many places to go for free all night. We appreciate your buiesness. Just wanted to let you know what time cover went into effect.. Tues ..Wed. Thurs  is no cover.

name: Shane Slocum
text: Nicest place in town without a doubt..Mobile hasnt seen a place like this before.

name: Tashunda Montgomery
text: The most comfortable and friendly after- hours Lounge.

name: Eddie Ocean
text: Really classy place!  Not to mention a very attractive bartender.  We will be back for sure!

resp.text: Always glad to see a happy customer ty for the positive feedback

name: Serenityy “Annie” Diamond
text: Absolutely A-1 fun place to be for parting,  chillin,  pool, foosball,   a bite to eat,  to dance,  see friends, loosen up,  grab a drink or 14 drinks. It doesnt matter wat you're there to do,  it's  gonna be a blast. Youll surely either see someone you  kno, havent seen in a while,  or someone youll be happy to meet.  The staff is amazing especially ole big ron! Lol. Yall gotta try it if you havent already!

resp.text: Ty very much..means a lot us to hear grate reviews

name: Katie Woods
text: A great place for people who love to party all night

name: Shane Tanner
text:
Great place to chill or to dance and have a great time
..food is also great and affordable...atmosphere is laid back and everyone is welcome...great spot to go

name: Lauren Daniel
text: Great Atmosphere! Open late! DJ on point

name: Victoria Hippensteel
text: Great ppl n music

name: Cory Bower
text: Very gangster felt uncomfortable in the parking lot.. never made it to the door.. didn't have a gun

name: Roy Aleman
text: Great atmosphere and food

resp.text: Ty Roy always happy to hear everyone's  reviews

name: Lashonda Raine
text: Nice club spot

name: Patrice Mccrea
text: Excellent chill spot

name: Jason Cooley
text: Party Hardy for sho! The real deal!

name: Tamara Reed-Apkins
text: Good after spot for the after spot on a club night

name: A'sha James
text: Nice place

name: Mr. Pettaway
text: Best

name: Tracy Kiker
text: Not really my cup of tea

name: To Die For
text: Good food!!

name: Mostafa Abdelrahman
text: Great vibe

name: Johnnie Huff
text: No Henessy! No Corona Light!

resp.text: HI Johnnie, we do our best to stock things that our repeat customers request..we do not  get asked for corona light so we do not stock..this ensures our patrons get a fresh brew..Hen is only stocked  at handfull of establishments around mobile. Sorry we couldn't make your visit at the Boulevard  better than a 2 star review but we do thank you for your feedback.

name: Boomcie
text: Great Service....

name: Lanay Glenn
text: Great crowd

name: Maurice Bush
text: I love it

name: nina williams
text: Drinks

name: Robert Malone
text: Love it

name: David Umanzor
text: Very good

text: Great time great atmosphere

name: Urich Hall
text: Great chill spot.

name: Ebony Perkins
text: Love everything about it

name: Esther Muhubao
text: Awesome place with amazing music!
